summary:
*This is a sword import from Roblox. (Someone at Roblox support said it would be fine.)

You can find the swords stuck in a rock outside of anises's Cabin, the spell tome for a bound version in her basement, and you can also craft them with the ebony smithing perk, Saber Cat Tooth, Ebony Ingot, and Leather strips.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.roblox.com/Rainbowrath-The-Avenger-item?id=346686597]*This is a sword import from Roblox.Â [/url]

You can find the swords stuck in a rock outside of anises's Cabin, a spell tome for a bound Unicorn Sword in her basement, and you can also craft them with the ebony smithing perk, Saber Cat Tooth, Ebony Ingot, and Leather strips.
I don't think it defies lore, but if it does, tell me.

Also, You can craft the [url=https://www.roblox.com/ROBLOX-Classic-Brigands-Sword-item?id=10468915]Brigands blade[/url] with the steel smithing perk, three gold, a pearl, two steel ingot, and two leather strips.

author: ZippySilver
